value.title: How to modify a linked entity in Power BI dataflows
value.excerpt: It is not possible to change a linked entity in a dataflow in Power BI. Linked entities has to be modified only in the dataflow in which they are created. value.title: How to Reduce the Size of Power BI file in a few Steps
value.excerpt: One of the performance considerations of a Power BI file is to reduce the size of it as much as possible.
